translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Book of Conditional Relations in the Abhidhamma

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽11.14. Saṅkiliṭṭhattika, Kusalattika🔽Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ🔽nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya  saṅkiliṭṭhattika kusalattika  na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesika  na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca
translated: The Triad of the Corrupted, the Triad of the Wholesome🔽With a corrupted and corruptedly arisen …🔽With a corrupted and uncorrupted …🔽With an uncorrupted and corrupted …🔽(Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa …pe… vipāke ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe āsevane sattarasa pe vipāke ekavīsa pe avigate ekūnatisa
